exception.invalidvariation: [FATAL] Invalid $1 XML file in $2 : There can only be one variations section
exception.invalidid: [FATAL] Invalid $1 XML file in $2 : There can only be one id per variation
exception.missingid: [FATAL] Invalid $1 XML file in $2 : There is a variation missing an id
exception.invalidtype: [FATAL] Invalid $1 XML file in $2 : There can only be one type per entity
exception.missingtype: [FATAL] Invalid $1 XML file in $2 : There is an entity missing an type
